text: Westmount is a suburb on the Island of Montreal, in southwestern Quebec, Canada. It is an enclave of the city of Montreal, with a population of 19,658 as of the 2021 Canadian census. Westmount was home of the Montreal Arena, the third arena in history to be built specifically for hockey. The 2021 census found that 48.7% of residents spoke English, and 20.0% spoke French, as their first language. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Cities and towns in Quebec
title: Westmount, Quebec
